definition: can/may/able to/to approve/to permit/to suit/(particle used for emphasis) certainly/very
to love/to be fond of/to like/affection/to be inclined (to do sth)/to tend to (happen)

sentences.english: Pop dot long T collocation tooling tall waist trousers, small lovely overflow.
sentences.chinese: 波普圓點長T搭配工裝高腰褲，小可愛洋溢。

sentences.english: ET: Plus, you have a cute little bathtub scene that's kind of racy.
sentences.chinese: 加上，你有點小可愛的浴盆的場面有些越級。
再見吧，米雪，我的小可愛。

sentences.english: Under her small lovely nose, there is a little naughty mouth.
sentences.chinese: 在她小可愛的鼻子下面，有一個小淘氣的嘴巴。

sentences.english: But you haven't tasted my gumbo. How you doing, cutie ?
sentences.chinese: 但是你還沒有嘗過我做的秋葵湯你好嗎小可愛？

sentences.english: I think she is a cutie.
sentences.chinese: 我覺患上她是個小可愛。

definition: see you tomorrow/(coll., jocular) food that passes through the digestive system more or less intact (esp. enoki mushrooms)
photogenic/to appear on film or in the media
to take liberties with a woman/to dally/to assail a woman with obscenities
(final particle equivalent to 了[le5])/(particle calling attention to, or mildly warning of, a situation)
(sentence-final particle expressing exhortation)/(syllable filler in a song)
